channel.title: 2 codes need help with

item.title: 2 codes need help with
item.dc:creator: @war_of_godzz war of godzz
item.description:
@war_of_godzz wrote:

how i make this code for admin up

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“brid”)&& c.playerRights >= 2) {
int[] equip = { 10828, 2414, 6585, 15050, 4712, 15021, -1, 4714, -1,
7462, 6920, -1, 6737};
for (int i = 0; i < equip.length; i++) {
c.playerEquipment[i] = equip[i];
c.playerEquipmentN[i] = 1;
c.getItems().setEquipment(equip[i], 1, i);
}

			c.getItems().addItem(11724, 1);				
			c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(4736, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(2440, 1);				
			c.getItems().addItem(11726, 1);				
			c.getItems().addItem(11283, 1);				
			c.getItems().addItem(6685, 1);				
			c.getItems().addItem(2436, 1);				
			c.getItems().addItem(391, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(3024, 3);
			c.getItems().addItem(391, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(391, 7);
			c.getItems().addItem(5698, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(560, 5000);			
			c.getItems().addItem(391, 4);
			c.getItems().addItem(565, 5000);
			c.getItems().addItem(555, 5000);
			c.playerMagicBook = 1;
			c.getItems().resetItems(3214);
			c.getItems().resetBonus();
			c.getItems().getBonus();
			c.getItems().writeBonus();
	}

and also this one
tryed changing the rights to 2 still no work

if(playerCommand.startsWith(“npc”) && c.playerRights >= 2) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(4));
if(newNPC > 0) {
Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, newNPC, c.absX, c.absY, 0, 0, 120, 7, 70, 70, false, false);
c.sendMessage(“You spawn a Npc.”);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such NPC.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}			
		}
